translations: adj.水力发电的；水电治疗的

sentences.sentence: Hydroelectric power and flood control and irrigation are possible without building monster dams.
sentences.translation: 水力发电、防洪和灌溉都不需要建造大型水坝。

sentences.sentence: Hydroelectric power and flood control and irrigation are possible without building monster dams.

sentences.sentence: The hydroelectric station is nearing completion.
